title: China to allow couples to have up to three children to cope with aging society
content:
1. China to allow couples to have up to three children to cope with aging society  NBC News
  2. China Says It Will Allow Couples to Have 3 Children, Up From 2  The New York Times

  4. Reactions to China's new three-child policy  Reuters
  5. China to allow couples to have up to three children in attempt to reverse falling birth rates  CNN

localize.title: 中国、高齢化社会に対応して夫婦間で子供を3人まで持てるようにする
